1483750.name: Druta-Cinta
1483750.description:
Druta-Cinta is the debut video game by Izyan Lopez.

This is a concise and relaxing strategy simulation, but it also challenges you to replay the game in different ways.

Originally made as an unblocked school Chromebook time killer for my friends, this game was created when I was 14 years old. Now, after all these years, I am here to finish what I started by publishing it. It's the type of game I would like to play while listening to my music or talking to my friends, so feel free to turn off the music.

Content and features:

In this game, you play as a blue square from a top-down 2D perspective. When you stop, everything else stops. When you move, everything does. You can take your time on each level because of this. Beware the red-colored enemies that will do their best to attack you. You get to use great weapons in your arsenal including a gun, bombs, a sword, a boomerang, and a shotgun. You have to move around to reload your attack or activate certain things. There are a lot of silly and awesome sound & visual effects that make it a good experience for the ears.

I hope you enjoy this game and experiment with this small adventure to get all the achievements. Thank you!!

Here's a tip for playing: I advise you to turn the mouse sensitivity up to play faster, and with a controller, you can press on the left stick to make the cursor go faster.
